Detailed Description

Connect to tapi_core with a Bool subscriber, a Bool publisher, a Hello ServiceServer and a Hello ServiceClient. Sends/Calls twice a second.

See also
Hello.srv in the tapi_lib package
Author
Tobias Holst
Version
1.0.1

Definition at line 56 of file fulldemo.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Tapi::FullDemo::FullDemo ( ros::NodeHandle *  nh)
explicit

Create a FullDemo object to connect to tapi_core and send test data twice a second.

Sends out a Bool message and a Hello call. Also receives a Bool topic and prints its data on reception and a Hello call which just prints if it was successfully called.

Parameters
nhPointer to a ros::NodeHandle created outside of this class

Definition at line 53 of file fulldemo.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

void Tapi::FullDemo::gotit ( const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &  msg)
private

Called by a ros callback when a new Bool has been got. Then it prints its state on the console.

Parameters
msgThe message waiting in the ros message queue where the Bool is stored

Definition at line 116 of file fulldemo.cpp.

bool Tapi::FullDemo::hello ( tapi_lib::Hello::Request &  helloReq,
tapi_lib::Hello::Response &  helloResp 
)
private

Called by a ros callback when a new call on its Hello service has been got. Then it prints on the console that there was a successfull call.

Parameters
helloReqThe request of the service call, not used.
helloRespThe response of the service call, always a STATUS_ERROR since this is not a real Hello service.
Returns
Always true
See also
Hello.srv in the tapi_lib package

Definition at line 94 of file fulldemo.hpp.

ros::ServiceClient** Tapi::FullDemo::serviceclient
private

Doublepointer to a ros::ServiceClient to call the Hello service testwise.

Warning
Has to be dereferenced once at first. Then check it whether its a null pointer. If not it can be used by dereferencing it twice. If it's a null pointer when dereferencing once it means there is no connetion to a ros::ServiceServer.

bool Tapi::FullDemo::turn
